title: Reading the Question In-Depth
text: We know that we want to find the probability that $$35$$ of the $$50$$ are gumdrops. Think about how gumdrops is a group within the greater population within the candy dish.

title: Determining the group of interest
text: Since we want to find the probability that $$35$$ of the $$50$$ are gumdrops, what is the group of interest?
